Control Name: Establishes Exception Handling Procedures From Vendors and Business Partners —The entity establishes exception handling procedures for service or product issues related to vendors and business partners.

control_attributes.Control: Establishes Exception Handling Procedures From Vendors and Business Partners —The entity establishes exception handling procedures for service or product issues related to vendors and business partners.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
